about_the_game:
Alexandra, a lonely 27-year-old girl, after a hard week at work, went to a nightclub to celebrate her friend’s birthday. She meets a very attractive and wealthy man named Eric, who clearly has his eye on her. During the meeting, Alexandra loses consciousness. When she wakes up, she finds herself in a small room with a chain around her ankle. Eric brought her to his country house for some of his games. Alexandra’s complete confusion gives way to determination, and she clearly understands that she must escape at any cost!

Alexandra.

27 years

Pretty, smart, strong in body and character. All my life I was strong, focused on work, respect in the team. But I realized that this did not lead to anything good, so I decided to become a professional single. Sasha grew up in a single-parent family, she was raised only by her mother. Together with their mother, they were opposed to this world, as one hero, one team. Distrust of everyone else and the whole world. Force. Rigidity. Defending independence.

Eric.

About 35 years old, single

Handsome, successful

Diagnoses:

– narcissistic personality disorder

He inherited his father’s small business, which was able to develop into a global giant with roots in governments. Now Eric has everything, and he is saturated with power, so much so that the only thing that makes him happy in life is the combination of power over the victim, hunting, narcissism and taking life. And Alexandra should become his first and only failure in life.

Eric is a hunter.

Logical quests, where you have to think carefully with your head

• The mysterious personality of the maniac, revealed throughout the storyline

• An unusual story that will not leave anyone indifferent

• Blink effect

• Many references to works of art, cinema, literature

• Starring – Dasha Ostrovskaya

• Possibility of choosing the ending

• Easter eggs from the developers are included in the price of the game

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, the main character can be seen in a sexually explicit outfit, but with covered nudity. There is also a room with BDSM toys in the house, but they will not be used, only for the atmosphere that the player is in the house of a maniac. There are also pictures of girls with covered nudity in the game. During the Game Over in the cut scene, the main character is in shackles, but without a scene of sexual violence.

name: Run away from me. Alexandra Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 4x3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 6x3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4 Gb / AMD Radeon R9 380 4 Gb
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 4x3.6 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X 8x3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8 Gb / AMD RX Vega 64 8 Gb
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An action-packed adventure quest with horror elements about Alexandra, who fell into the clutches of a maniac. Your task is to escape from him, completing quests along the way. What ending will you have? Can you choose from the maniac's lair? And who is the real victim in this story?
